quotes.text: Learning is not a spectator sport.
quotes.author: D. Blocher

quotes.text: The beautiful thing about learning is that no one can take it away from you.
quotes.author: B.B. King

quotes.text: Change is the end result of all true learning.
quotes.author: Leo Buscaglia

quotes.text: I am always doing that which I cannot do, in order that I may learn how to do it.
quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

quotes.text: The more I live, the more I learn. The more I learn, the more I realize, the less I know.
quotes.author: Michel Legrand

quotes.text: Learning is the only thing the mind never exhausts, never fears, and never regrets.
quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

quotes.text: Live as if you were to die tomorrow. Learn as if you were to live forever.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.text: The expert in anything was once a beginner.
quotes.author: Helen Hayes

quotes.text: You don't learn to walk by following rules. You learn by doing, and by falling over.
quotes.author: Richard Branson
